info.description: The Jenkins Remote Access API provides programmatic access to Jenkins, an open source automation server designed to support the deployment and automation of any kind of project. This API can be used to create or copy jobs, trigger a new build, or retrieve information from Jenkins for programmatic consumption.
info.title: Jenkins Remote Access API

x-applicationinfo.x-API-Description: The Jenkins Remote Access API provides programmatic access to Jenkins, an open source automation server designed to support the deployment and automation of any kind of project. This API can be used to create or copy jobs, trigger a new build, or retrieve information from Jenkins for programmatic consumption.
x-applicationinfo.x-App-Description: Jenkins is an open source automation server with an unparalleled plugin ecosystem to support practically every tool as part of your delivery pipelines.
